definition: chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means

sentences.english: The popularity of television and the difficulty of financing plays have helped to close many theatres.
sentences.chinese: 电视的普及以及戏剧筹资的困难迫使许多戏院关了门。

sentences.english: This is their first institutional round.
sentences.chinese: 这是他们的第一轮筹资。

sentences.english: We must use all potential means of raising resources, including debt relief.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须利用所有潜在的筹资手段，包括减免债务。

sentences.english: In addition, noncash investing and financing activities are reported in an accompanying schedule .
sentences.chinese: 另外，非现金投资和筹资活动被披露在附表中。

sentences.english: Finances 310,000 Yuan by the periphery five village teams to complete the use.
sentences.chinese: 由周围五个村队筹资31万余元建成使用。

sentences.english: Much of the alleged bribery was connected to fund-raising efforts in recent election campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 据称这些贿金的大部分都和近来竞选活动的筹资有关。

sentences.english: What is new in health financing in the report?
sentences.chinese: 报告在卫生筹资方面有哪些新内容？

sentences.english: Discussions on the overall design and level of funding are continuing.
sentences.chinese: 当前，关于总体设计方案和筹资水平的讨论仍在继续。

sentences.english: Any effective strategy for health care financing must be home-grown.
sentences.chinese: 任何有效的卫生保健筹资战略都必须适应本国情况。

sentences.english: Money-raising is the key for the survival and the development of the university.
sentences.chinese: 高校筹资是高等学校生存和发展的命脉。

sentences.english: So funding risk is objective existence.
sentences.chinese: 所以筹资风险是客观存在的。

sentences.english: Media guru Yang Lan raises money for Specia.
sentences.chinese: 传媒大腕杨澜为特奥会筹资。

sentences.english: You will be considering an item on the Future of financing for WHO.
sentences.chinese: 你们此次将审议的一个项目涉及世卫组织的筹资前景。

sentences.english: The villagers have decided to raise funds to build a small reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 村民们准备自筹资金修建塘坝。

sentences.english: Our village is holding a fete to raise money for the building of the new hall.
sentences.chinese: 我们村里准备举行游园会，以筹资建造新会堂。

sentences.english: But it usually required developing country collaborators to raise their own funds.
sentences.chinese: 但是它常常要求发展中国家的合作者自筹资金。

definition: to fund/to put money into sth/to invest
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
